name: Generic Red (3 levels)
description:
Cursor Keys, WASD or touch (mobile) to control 'Red'

Collect 'all' the light orbs to open the end portal.

Enter the portal to complete the game.

This engine supports a lot of fun stuff - well... play the level to see! But there is scope for much more than this :).

Want more levels? :) - How easy was this first one? and what was your time?

Anybody suggest some nice background music for this?
